CONVERA.MX.summary: Convertidora Industrial, S.A.B. de C.V. engages in the production and conversion of plastic films for use as flexible packaging for industrial, food, and party item applications in Mexico and internationally. The company provides flexible packaging products, including plastic bags, plastic packaging films, laminations, five-layer co-extrusions, wickets, pouches, standing pouches, zipper and courier bags, etc., as well as balloons, banners, printed tablecloths, door banners, and printed titeres. Convertidora Industrial, S.A.B. de C.V. is based in Guadalajara, Mexico.
